content: *one of our menagerie of amigurumi animals this bright little fish is sure to be a favorite lion brand yarn * published in knit 1 skill level easy 2 colors 1 ball each vanna s choice® article #860 or lion® wool article #820 crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm split ring stitch markers 2 plastic safety eyes 9 mm diameter fiberfill stuffing some construction required to finish fins & tail made separately available in different versions 81096ad 2 2009 vanna s choice® article #860 *pea green & sapphire* 70581ad 1 2005 lion® wool article #820 *lemongrass & dark teal* 1 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-amigurumi-angel-fish-2 2 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/81096ad html
